data.title: The Jim Henson Company CEO And Leadership: Executives and Demographics
data.meta_description: The Jim Henson Company CEO And Executives - Learn more about The Jim Henson Company CEO Lisa Henson and key people by exploring the management team.
data.text:
Zippia gives an in-depth look into the details of The Jim Henson Company, including salaries, political affiliations, employee data, and more, in order to inform job seekers about The Jim Henson Company. The employee data is based on information from people who have self-reported their past or current employments at The Jim Henson Company. The data on this page is also based on data sources collected from public and open data sources on the Internet and other locations, as well as proprietary data we licensed from other companies. Sources of data may include, but are not limited to, the BLS, company filings, estimates based on those filings, H1B filings, and other public and private datasets. While we have made attempts to ensure that the information displayed are correct, Zippia is not responsible for any errors or omissions or for the results obtained from the use of this information. None of the information on this page has been provided or approved by The Jim Henson Company. The data presented on this page does not represent the view of The Jim Henson Company and its employees or that of Zippia.

The Jim Henson Company may also be known as or be related to Jim Henson, Jim Henson Company, The Jim Henson Co., Inc., The Jim Henson Company and The Jim Henson Company Inc.
